title: Cry Vengeance
features: Investigating the murder of a rapist who was freed on a technicality, rookie reporter Jessica Mitchell uncovers four similar murders that reveal the determined acts of a group of retribution seekers. Reprint.
description: Ron Handberg is an award-winning journalist. He has been news director as well as vice president and general manager of Emmy and Peabody Award-winning station WCCO television, a CBS affiliate in Minneapolis/St. Paul. He lives in Minnesota.
